imdb.plot outline: The story of 5 girls trying to make it big in Hollywood. Some see their dreams of being the next Angelina Jolie become a reality, while others find that things don't quite pan out as they expected - leading them to places they never imagined. LOS SCANDALOUS will follow these 5 girls in their unique journeys to stardom, from catfights to auditions and everything in between. The show is edgy, provocative, endearing, and above all - scandalous.
imdb.title: Los Scandalous
